name: Orbital Transit
summary: Three stellar corridors linking planets and systems with crossovers at Vega Reach and Orionis Gate for easy transfers.

stations.name: Helios Prime
stations.description: A sun-warmed hub where travelers gather beneath golden light that never quite fades.

stations.name: Cinderia
stations.description: A drifting ember-world whose platforms glow like the last sparks of a dying star.

stations.name: Vega Reach
stations.description: A crystalline crossing where starlight refracts into prismatic paths for wandering souls.

stations.name: Orionis Gate
stations.description: A grand celestial threshold where every corridor feels like the beginning of an old legend.

stations.name: Titan Border
stations.description: A frontier station perched on the hush between vast ice fields and silent cosmic tides.

stations.name: Cygnus Way
stations.description: A gentle outpost where gull-wing nebulae drift lazily above the platform rails.

stations.name: Kepler Forge
stations.description: An industrious orbit-workshop where constellations seem hammered into shape each dusk.

stations.name: Arcturus Dorange
stations.description: A warm, fragrant stop known for amber skies that smell faintly of citrus and stardust.

stations.name: Sagan Halo
stations.description: A luminous ring-station that hums softly with the quiet wonder of distant worlds.

stations.name: Lyra Verge
stations.description: A melodic crossing where cosmic winds carry the echo of unseen harps.

stations.name: Lumen Cradle
stations.description: A glowing sanctuary nestled in deep space where light itself seems to rest and dream.

stations.name: Proxima Step
stations.description: A humble midpoint marked by wayfarersâ€™ footprints glittering like distant promises.

stations.name: Zephyr System
stations.description: A breezy orbital junction where gentle solar winds sigh through its floating arches.

stations.name: Altair Rim
stations.description: A bright ridge-station where shimmering pathways skim the edge of luminous voids.

stations.name: Farpoint Prime
stations.description: A serene apex of the line where travelers pause to watch galaxies bloom in silence.
